channel.title: metagam on Øystein Sørensen
channel.description: Recent content in metagam on Øystein Sørensen

item.title: Presentation of metagam at ERUM2020
item.description: The European R User Meeting 2020 has so far been a really great event, with interesting talks and online presentations working smoothly. I presented the metagam package this morning, and the slides are available here.
